dct_description_sm: Date of publication from Tooley. Double hemispherical world map showing routes of early explorers. Relief shown pictorially. From: Atlas nouveau ... A Amsterdam : Chez Jean Cóvens et Corneille Mortier, [1730].
dct_publisher_sm: A Amsterdam : Chez Jean Cóvens et Corneille Mortier, geographes, [1730]
